channel.title: Posts on BarrCodes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on BarrCodes

item.title: Exploding Pokemon As Fast As Possible
item.description: In this post I will answer ShoddyCast’s challange and simulate Pokemon battles looking for an extremely rare sequence of results that can save a theoretical game save from a softlock using Rust, and later, also CUDA.

item.title: Building a Responsive Blog With 56 Lines Of JavaScript
item.description: For a long time I wanted to write more code, but didn’t have a good reason to. Now I have a solution: dump it all on a blog, maybe someone can learn something from it. I’m not a big fan of front-end design, JavaScript, and bloat in general, so I’m pretty allergic to frameworks. It can’t be that hard to write a basic blog without one, right?
